values: Frost is a white layer of ice that forms during very cold weather.
In the morning, the trees were all covered with frost.
n. 霜；冰冻，严寒；冷淡 vi. 结霜；受冻 vt. 结霜于；冻坏
n. 霜；冰冻，严寒；冷淡

- vt. & vi. (使)结冰霜
- vt. 冻坏
- n. 霜
- 霜冻, 严寒天气
Frost弗罗斯特(姓氏)

frosted, frosting, frosts
